forecast.day_comments: Patchy fog.  Otherwise, partly cloudy, with a low around 25. Calm wind becoming south around 5 mph.
forecast.night_comments: Showers, mainly after 2pm.  High near 45. South wind 8 to 17 mph.  Chance of precipitation is 80%. New precipitation amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.
